description: This file serves as the main entry point for a Vue 3 application, initializing the app, applying plugins like Pinia for state management and Vue Router for navigation, and mounting the app to the DOM.

methods.name: app.use
methods.description: Method to register plugins with the Vue application instance (used for Pinia and Router).

methods.name: app.mount
methods.description: Method to mount the Vue application to a DOM element.
